price: Just as your Lord brought you [O Prophet] out of your home for a just cause[2], even though a group of believers were averse to it.
arabic: كَمَآ أَخۡرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَيۡتِكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لَكَٰرِهُونَ
footnotes: [2] It is referring to the Battle of Badr.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kamā akhrajaka rabbuka min baytika bil-ḥaqi wa-inna farīqan mina al-mu'minīna lakārihūna
